About

Epameinondas was born in Chalkida and is based in Athens. He holds a bachelor's degree in Life Science and Information Technology and worked in the health sector for a few years. He started attending photography and cinematography seminars at an art workshop in Chalkida and at the POFPA club of the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens. His passion is shooting and developing films. With his analog camera in hand, he constantly shoots, develops, and prints urban, life and nature themed pictures. He also digitizes 35mm films. His secret passion is travel photography!
